item.title: video editing notes
item.description: This is how I edit videos of talks that I need to incorporate slides and video together I’m on a Mac import to iMovie (using v10 something) drop movie into editing section split pdf slides into individual files pdfseparate foobar.pdf %d.pdf convert individual pdf slides into png sips -s format png --out "${pdf%%.*}.png" "$pdf" import png’s into imovie for each image, drop into editing area where you want it when focused on the png of the slide: select crop, then - choose fit, say okay select “add as overlay” (very most left symbol), then choose picture in picture then choose swap then move inset to where you want it say okay rinse and repeat for all slides export - via File option share to youtube e.
